title: Is it possible to rupture the space-time continuum by any means? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rupture? We might not know. But dent? Surely. Every body (mass) creates small dents in the fabric of space time. Usually it isn't noticable. But dense celestial bodies like neutron stars make significant dents. Black holes create a yawning chasm in the fabric of space time. That's as close you'll get as rupturing it.  Peace!
